gw.rules

Class ExecutionSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.rules.ExecutionSession

  • public class ExecutionSession
extends Object
    Stores named attributes that can be set by rule actions for later examination (only at the end of rule execution?).

    Implementation note: the contained HashMap is lazy constructed; in many cases no attributes will be set; this minimizes unnecessary object construction.

        Parameters:
